page.title: 05MIDDLE AND HIGH SCHOOLS
page.content: ARCH BISHOP CRANMER SCHOOL (MIDDLE) There are 231 pupils between 9 and l3 years. The school covers 16071 sq.ft. There are 13 teaching rooms. There are 12 teachers plus the Head. The school hours are 9am. until 3.30pm. The school competes in many events. The school provides no transport. CARDINAL HEENAN HIGH SCHOOL. There are 700 pupils between 13 and 18 years although you can leave when you are l6. There are over 50 teachers whose average annual wage is about 8000 pounds. There are 3 deputy heads.There are 4 main subjects- Maths,English, Science and French. There are 5 years- 3rd. years, 4th. years, 5th. years,lower 6th and upper 6th.Cardinal Heenan has 2 gymnasiums,dining halls and assembly halls.
